items.name: Meginord's Vise
explicitMods: Melee Strike Skills deal Splash Damage to surrounding targets
Melee Hits with Strike Skills always Knockback
flavourText: Ride with pride,
strike with vengeance,
live with honour.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 64% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that apply an effect to an area around a targeted location. Cannot support Vaal skills or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 16% less Area of Effect
Supported Area of Effect Skills also affect areas in front of and behind the targeted area
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a wall of ice which holds back enemies. Targets under the wall are damaged and pushed back.
explicitMods: 0.2 seconds between appearance of Wall sections
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Malachai's Loop
implicitMods: 8% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Fire Damage
explicitMods: 20% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit
12% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges
Shocks you when you reach Maximum Power Charges
flavourText: Thaumaturgy has no limit.
It is our fragile reality that imposes boundaries.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.typeLine: Terrified Divine Life Flask of Sealing
explicitMods: Instant Recovery when on Low Life

Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 7 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 7 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Mark of Submission
explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit
flavourText: So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all enemies in an area, lowering their action speed and making other effects on them expire more slowly.
explicitMods: 50% less Effect of Curse against Players
Cursed Normal and Magic Enemies have 29% less Action Speed
Other effects on Cursed enemies expire 25% slower
Cursed Rare and Unique Enemies have 18% less Action Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Void Battery
explicitMods: 25% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
flavourText: "The trick is to give nothingness,
and to receive everything in return."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that create permanent auras around you, changing their reservation to a cost and making them temporary. Cannot support banner or stance skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 34% increased Aura effect

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Auras from Supported Skills have a base duration of 10.90 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby allies have 39% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 15% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time.
explicitMods: Void Sphere has 10% increased Pulse Frequency
40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 39% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere
